homePage.tagline1: The world is built on ideas.
homePage.tagline2: We're shaping the world, one idea at a time.

aboutUs.title1: The World is Built on IDEAS,
aboutUs.title2: GKSYAPI Brings Your Ideas into Reality
aboutUs.paragraph1: With diverse backgrounds and expertise, we collaborate seamlessly to turn ideas into reality, crafting architectural masterpieces that inspire and endure.
aboutUs.paragraph2: We believe in construction that enhances the human experience, providing clarity in form while maintaining an effortless elegance.

solutions.description: At GKS Yapı, we don't just build structures—we shape modern, sustainable, and high-quality living spaces that redefine city life. As a trusted leader in Istanbul's construction and real estate sector, we are committed to innovation, excellence, and long-term value for homeowners and investors alike.

housing.description: We deliver modern, high-quality, and aesthetically refined homes that are more than just living spaces—they are future-proof investments. Our expertise in housing sales and production ensures that every residence meets the evolving needs of urban life while providing unmatched comfort and security.
housing.ctaButton: Your dream home is ready—invest in the future today!

customBuilt.description: From residences and workspaces to large-scale corporate and private projects, we tailor every build with precision. GKS Yapı integrates cutting-edge construction technologies with a meticulous quality approach, ensuring that every project is a benchmark of excellence.
customBuilt.ctaButton: Crafted with precision, built for legacy.

buildingFuture.description: At GKS Yapı, we don't just build structures—we shape modern, sustainable, and high-quality living spaces that redefine city life. As a trusted leader in İstanbul's construction and real estate sector, we are committed to innovation, excellence, and long-term value for homeowners and investors alike.
buildingFuture.ctaButton: Let's build your vision together—contact us now!

urbanTransformation.description: With a focus on earthquake-resistant, energy-efficient, and sustainable urban renewal, we are reshaping İstanbul's skyline. Our expertise in fast project execution and strategic planning ensures that urban transformation is smooth, safe, and economically viable.
urbanTransformation.ctaButton: Be part of the new era of modern cities—partner with us!

sustainableLiving.description: We integrate green spaces, eco-friendly materials, and smart energy solutions into our projects, creating cities that thrive both today and in the future. Sustainability isn't an afterthought—it's at the core of our design philosophy.
sustainableLiving.ctaButton: Sustainable cities, better living—join the movement!

timeline.title: Establishment of GKS YAPI
timeline.description: GKS YAPI was founded, laying groundwork for future real estate innovations.

timeline.title: First Residential Project
timeline.description: Completed our first residential project, setting standards for quality living spaces.

timeline.title: Expansion in Istanbul
timeline.description: Expanded operations within Istanbul, focusing on urban residential developments.

timeline.title: Commercial Ventures
timeline.description: Entered the commercial real estate market with innovative office spaces.

timeline.title: Sustainability Initiatives
timeline.description: Implemented sustainable building practices across all projects.

timeline.title: National Recognition
timeline.description: Received national awards for excellence in real estate development.

timeline.title: International Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded into European markets, establishing presence in key cities.

timeline.title: Digital Transformation
timeline.description: Adopted digital tools for project management and customer engagement.

timeline.title: Community Development
timeline.description: Launched initiatives to support and develop local communities.

timeline.title: Future-Ready Projects
timeline.description: Focused on integrating smart technologies in new developments.

sections.title: Building the Future of Türkiye, One Landmark at a Time
sections.description: At GKS Yapı, we don't just build structures—we shape modern, sustainable, and high-quality living spaces that redefine city life. As a trusted leader in İstanbul's construction and real estate sector, we are committed to innovation, excellence, and long-term value for homeowners and investors alike.

sections.title: Urban Transformation
sections.description: With a focus on earthquake-resistant, energy-efficient, and sustainable urban renewal, we are reshaping İstanbul's skyline. Our expertise in fast project execution and strategic planning ensures that urban transformation is smooth, safe, and economically viable.

sections.title: Sustainable Living
sections.description: We integrate green spaces, eco-friendly materials, and smart energy solutions into our projects, creating cities that thrive both today and in the future. Sustainability isn't an afterthought—it's at the core of our design philosophy.

sections.title: Confidence in Housing
sections.description: We deliver modern, high-quality, and aesthetically refined homes that are more than just living spaces—they are future-proof investments. Our expertise in housing sales and production ensures that every residence meets the evolving needs of urban life while providing unmatched comfort and security.

jobListings.title: Construction Manager
jobListings.description: Lead and oversee construction projects from inception to completion. Manage timelines, budgets, and team coordination.

jobListings.title: Architectural Designer
jobListings.description: Create innovative architectural designs for residential and commercial properties. Collaborate with clients and contractors.

jobListings.title: Project Engineer
jobListings.description: Manage technical aspects of construction projects. Ensure compliance with building codes and safety regulations.

jobListings.title: Real Estate Analyst
jobListings.description: Analyze market trends, property valuations, and investment opportunities. Prepare detailed financial reports and forecasts.

jobListings.title: Interior Designer
jobListings.description: Design and coordinate interior spaces for residential and commercial properties. Work with clients to realize their vision.
